title: nAma dhyAnam sheyya
sahitya:
nAma dhyAnam sheyya nI maravAdE manamE nAmaNakkavE dinam svAminAthan tiru


anupallavi

  kAmanai eritta shiva perumAn rasikkavE Omadan mahimaiyai Odina mEdaiyin


caraNam    jagamellAm nilavum nigarilAp-pugazhODu tigazhum guruparan tirunAmam OdinAl nI
ihaparam iraNDilum iccai koNDu nADum sukha bhOga saubhAgyam sakalamum kai kUDum
